title: The Most Important Question Not Being Asked (Ep 1617)
description:
In this episode I address the critical question being left out of the current political climate. 

News Picks:


Snitch culture is exploding. 


Cargo ships are backing up in ports, in a major crisis.

Communist Venezuela has descended into madness. 


Explosive new report about the FBI’s procedures for spying, is revealed. 

Joe Biden’s ten biggest lies.

Pelosi doesn’t have the votes to pass her bankruptcy bills.

Drunk man joins in a search party, searching for himself.
